text: This is a list of cities by average temperature (monthly and yearly). The temperatures listed are averages of the daily highs and lows. Thus, the actual daytime temperature in a given month will be higher than the temperature listed here, depending on how large the difference between daily highs and lows is. ==Africa== ==Asia== ==Europe== ==North America== ==Oceania== ==South America== == See also == * List of cities by sunshine duration * List of weather records == References == Category:Weather-related lists Category:Lists of cities List of cities by average temperature
title: List of cities by average temperature
